title: Border, "Frise Gros Jouy", 1950–58
description: A scalloped border in which a bouquet of roses alternates with a still life of roses, drooping flower vines, and a table holding decanter and glass. Red, pink, and lavender on cream-colored ground. Above, a border of buds on red ground and a border of daisies on beige ground. In style of late 18th century "toile de Jouy". On margin: "Frise Gros Jouy".

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, "Frise Gros Jouy", 1950–58.
1950–58. Machine-printed. Gift of Jessup, Inc.. 1958-115-42.
